Question
========
Which of the following is **notÂ **an assumption of MANOVA?

Answerlist
----------
* Multivariate normality
* Homogeneity of covariate matrices
* Sphericity
* Independence of observations

Solution
========





The assumptions of MANOVA are: multivariate normality, homogeneity of
the covariance matrices and independence of observations. Therefore
sphericity is the correct answer as this is not an assumption of MANOVA
